page.title: 14POLICE IN SEAHAM
page.content: IN SEAHAM THERE IS ONE LARGE POLICE STATION WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE CLIFF TOPS AT SEAHAM HARBOUR.SEAHAM IS POLICED BY DURHAM COUNTY CONSTABULARY. SEAHAM STATION COVERS THE WHOLE AREA OF SEAHAM INCLUDES THE HARBOUR,TOWN CENTRE,DAWDON,PARKSIDE,DENESIDE, SEATON,DALTON LE DALE AND MURTON.THE STATION IS OPERATED ON A THREE SHIFT SYSTEM OF EIGHT HOURS DURATION PER SHIFT AND THE AREA IS CONSTANTLY COVERED BY POLICE OFFICERS.THE CONTROL OF POLICE VEHICLES AND OFFICERS IS OPERATED THROUGH A COMPUTER AND RADIO SYSTEM.EMERGENCY CALLS ARE RECIEVED AND THE NEAREST POLICE OFFICER IS CONTACTED AND TRANSFERRED TO DEAL WITH THE EMERGENCY.THESE EMERGENCIES ARE SUPPORTED BY THE AMBULANCES AND FIRE SERVICES.THE POLICE OFFICERS ALSO DEAL WITH EVERY OTHER ASPECT OF LAW AND ORDER IN SEAHAM.
